metadata.name: Surrounded by Steel
metadata.description:
Chicagoâ€™s elevated tracks are an iconic part of the city, the rusty steel frames ready to collapse at any moment. Most of us will walk by without noticing the beauty of these structures. And as the city works to modernize the tracks, I choose to document the aged magnificence of these dilapidated stations.

Chicago || 2020 || PhilJones.eth
